headline: ComEd Files Four-Year Grid Plan to Sustain Reliability, Maintain Affordability and Adapt to Rising Energy Demands
summary: CHICAGO, January 17, 2026--ComEd today presented to the Illinois Commerce Commission (ICC) its second multi-year grid plan (MYGP) containing ComEd’s plans for critical investments to the grid in years 2028-2031. The plan builds upon the energy company’s previous plan to strengthen the grid to continue delivering safe and affordable electric service and nation-leading reliability for ComEd’s customers amid the challenges of increasingly extreme weather and rising energy demands.
